City Council

Meetings

  • 6 pm (Workshops, if scheduled, start at 5 pm.)
  • 1st and 3rd Tuesdays of every month
  • 508 S 2nd Street
    Copperas Cove, Texas 76522

Agendas & Minutes

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.
